name: Broken Threads
description:
A stray piece of code lands in an unknown world. Strange forces are at work, and something seems more... real... than it should be.

Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 46 compo. All artwork, music, sound effects, and code made by plasmastarfish during that period. I used the font "Myriad."

Tools:

Art: Paint.NET

Programming: Python/PyGame

Sound: SFXR, Audacity

Music: Sibelius
